snippet.title: Stronghold Crusader 2 - 'The Jackal & The Khan' DLC Trailer
snippet.description:
Now Available - http://store.steampowered.com/app/349231/

Their horsemen ride like thunder across the plain, like the kings of old! The Jackal & The Khan DLC adds an additional Crusader Trail campaign and a duo of new AI opponents. Two men destined to lead their forces across the wilds of the desert plain, The Jackal and The Khan are outcast warriors forced to survive on their wits and the loyalty of their men. Both nomads in their own way, the animalistic Khan and the fearless Jackal represent the ultimate challenge for Stronghold players.

The final character pack DLC for Stronghold Crusader 2, The Jackal & The Khan adds new missions, achievements, warrior-like coat of arms designs and castle types unique to these new Lords.

Like – https://www.facebook.com/StrongholdCrusaderII
Tweet – https://twitter.com/shcrusader2
Subscribe – http://bit.ly/fftubesub
Stream - http://bit.ly/ffstwitch
